alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 8:32PM AKST until January 11 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Downtown Juneau and Douglas. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...High winds will blow around unsecured objects and may damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mountain wave will develop in Downtown Juneau. The strongest winds will occur late Wednesday evening through Thursday morning.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Report any damage to the National Weather Service by visiting weather.gov/Juneau/StormReports
